name: Retro Asteroids
description:
Traveling through space you hit the asteroid zone, so it is necessary to destroy all the asteroids before they destroy your ship. Beware of hostile UFO! Survive as long as possible to earn more points.

Features:
- Intuitive control of the ship
- The graphics in the classic style
- The original musical arrangement

Hint: to control the spacecraft, touch the screen and slide finger and the ship will follow you.
